name: Dal Lake
pere: Dal Lake mirrors heaven on earth, cradling Kashmir in serene splendor.

name: Gulmarg
pere: Gulmarg a snowy paradise, whispers peace through pine forests and velvet meadows.

name: Pahalgam
pere: Pahalgam a snowy paradise, whispers peace through pine forests and velvet meadows.

name: Sonamarg
pere: Sonamarg glows golden at dawn, where glaciers kiss skies and rivers sing.

name: Doodhpathri
pere: Doodhpathri flows with milky streams, nestled in meadows of pure tranquility.

name: Tosamaidan
pere: Tosamaidan stretches wide and wild, echoing tales of freedom, peace, and beauty.

name: Mughal Gardens
pere: Mughal Gardens bloom in timeless grace, where nature meets royal artistry in harmony.

name: Yousmarg
pere: Yousmarg whispers serenity through pine-clad hills and meadows kissed by clouds

name: Drung Waterfall
pere: Drung Tangmarg roars with icy waterfalls, wrapped in mist and forested calm.

name: Tulip Garden
pere: Tulip Garden in Srinagar blooms beautifully each spring with vibrant colored tulips.
